headline: Ocular Therapeutix™ Appoints David W. Robinson as Global Chief Commercial Officer
summary: Accomplished global commercial leader with deep expertise in retina drug launches Primary architect for the industry-defining launch of EYLEA® while at Regeneron Most recently served as Chief Marketing Officer, Global Ophthalmology at Merck BEDFORD, Mass., Jan. 21, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Ocular Therapeutix, Inc. (NASDAQ: OCUL, “Ocular”), an integrated biopharmaceutical company committed to redefining the retina experience, today announced that David W. Robinson has agreed to join the Company a
